Headline: #79 79th and #169 69th/UPS Express Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Washtenaw
ShortDescription: Eastbound #79 79th and #169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 83rd, Western and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Washtenaw

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th and #169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 83rd, Western, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Washtenaw.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near 75th/South Shore.

Southbound buses will operate via 75th, Exchange, 79th, Exchange, 83rd, then resume normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via 79th, South Shore, 75th, Exchange, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
